    • createItemList

      public void createItemList(int startIndex, int width, int height, org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, List<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> items, int page)
      Create an item list with pages
      Parameters:
      startIndex - inventory slot where the list will begin
      width - amount of list columns (max 9)
      height - amount of list rows (max 6)
      inventory - inventory to put list in
      items - list of items to put in gui
      page - index of the current page
